Pre-Game Insights: West Indies are aiming for redemption after poor performances in previous T20 World Cup editions.
Papua New Guinea is looking to make a strong impression in their first T20I meeting against West Indies.
This will be the first T20I match between the two sides.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is being played at the Providence Stadium in Guyana.
Spinners have been dominant at this venue with an economy rate of 6.94 in recent T20I matches.
